Server.Name: GearsIRC
Server.MOTD:
Welcome to the GearsIRCd test server. 
Enjoy your stay!

Server.MaxPacketLen: Leave it at the default 512 if you don't know what it's for
Server.MaxChans: Maximum number of channels a user is allowed to join

Operators.Password: Plain text is not supported for security reasons, the example operator's password is 123456
Operators.PasswordHashMethod: Anything supported by the PHP hash() function (Most common: md5, sha1, sha256)
